coreAttributes.name: #IF (game.isSillyModeEnabled()) #THEN something utterly fucking disgusting #ELSE Dildo Bat #ENDIF
coreAttributes.namePlural: #IF (game.isSillyModeEnabled()) #THEN somethings that are utterly fucking disgusting #ELSE Dildo Bats #ENDIF
coreAttributes.description: A swingable, girthy penis attached to a hilt. Kinky, if not unwieldy.
coreAttributes.equipText: #IF (game.isSillyModeEnabled()) #THEN [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of the something utterly fucking disgusting as [npc.she] [npc.verb(prepare)] [npc.herself] to use it in lewd combat.] #ELSE [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of the Dildo Bat as [npc.she] [npc.verb(prepare)] [npc.herself] to use it in lewd combat.] #ENDIF
coreAttributes.unequipText: <![CDATA[#IF (game.isSillyModeEnabled()) #THEN [npc.Name] [npc.verb(store)] the something utterly fucking disgusting.] #ELSE [npc.Name] [npc.verb(store)] the Dildo Bat.] #ENDIF

hitDescriptions.hitText: #IF (game.isSillyModeEnabled()) [##var randDamage = RND.nextInt(6)+20] [##npc2.incrementLust(randDamage, true)] [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] [npc.her] utterly fucking disgusting at [npc2.name], watching as the utterly fucking disgusting makes contact with [npc2.her] face and deals [#randDamage] lust damage! #ELSE [##var randDamage = RND.nextInt(6)+20] [##npc2.incrementLust(randDamage, true)] [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] [npc.her] dildo bat at [npc2.name], watching as the dildo bat makes contact with [npc2.her] face and deals [#randDamage] lust damage! #ENDIF

missDescriptions.missText: #IF (game.isSillyModeEnabled()) [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] [npc.her] utterly fucking disgusting at [npc2.name], but the bat only swings just inches from [npc2.her] face. #ELSE [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] [npc.her] dildo bat at [npc2.name], but the bat only swings just inches from [npc2.her] face. #ENDIF
